column1: ThinkPad T14 Laptop,Laptops,14" Laptop equipped with all the software found on computer lab devices. Log-in using your Vandal ID. Includes a charger,3 weeks,$5/day,$70.00,$1475.00,28

Canon Vixia Video Camera,Video Equipment,VIXIA HF G20 HD Camcorder comes with 32GB Internal Flash Memory and 10x HD Video lens (5mm equivalent: 30.4mm – 304mm) with 8-Blade Iris and 3.5 inch touch LCD.

column2: The Canon DSLR Camera Kit includes a Canon EOS 4000d digital camera, a Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens, a Canon Neck Strap, a battery, a charger, a 32GB memory card, a memory card reader, and a small tripod.

column1: Digital Graphic Drawing Tablet Kit,Computer Accessories
column2: The Wacom Intuos Pro Paper features a creative pen with tilt-recognition and virtually lag–free tracking for artists and designers to capture editable versions of their paper sketches. The kit includes a tablet, a pen, a pen stand, a paper clip, four pen color rings, a USB cable, and a quick start guide.

The Tascam Portable Studio Recorder DR-05 features a pair of condenser microphones that handle up to 125dB SPL and records in MP3 or WAV format – including 96kHz/24-bit high-resolution audio – to microSD or microSDHC media. The kit includes a SM57 microphone.

GoPro Hero,Video Equipment,With built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, and user-friendly modes like QuikCapture, SuperView and Auto Low Light, GoPro HERO+LCD provides video recording at 1080p at 60 fps/and 8 megapixel photos. The kit comes with a clip mount and a suction cup mount.

column4: LTE Mobile WiFi Hotspot with unlimited data on the Verizon network (paid for by the library!). Includes a universal charger and USB port. Connect up to 15 different devices at a time to the WiFi.

The Sensyne 10-inch Selfie Ring Light with 51-inch Tripod Stand features three colors lighting modes with 10 brightness levels adjustable from 0% to 100% and a multi-functional adjustable travel tripod that can be extended from 16" to 51". The kit includes a ring light, a wireless remote shutter, a phone holder, and AC/DC adapter.

SINGER Start 1304 sewing machine with 57 stitch applications, all with pre-set stitch width and stitch length. Listing includes 1 Case, 1 Sewing Machine, 1 Quick Start Manual, 1 User Manual, 3 Bobbins, 1 Seam Ripper/Lint Brush, 1 Darning Plate, 1 Buttonhole Foot, 1 Multipurpose Foot, 1 Packet Needles, 1 Tape Measure, 1 Pressure foot with Power Cable.

The Blue Yeti USB Microphone features four different pattern modes to record audio for podcasting, Twitch streaming, music recording, voice overs, acoustic guitar, choir, band's live performance, a multi-person podcast, a conference call, duet or a two-person interview. The kit includes a USB microphone, a USB cable, and a quick start guide.
The Impact Super Collapsible Background (8 x 16 ft) is a single-sided green background that can fold into small circular size and can be used horizontally or vertically.
The video light kit contains two LED lights, two light stands, three filters, batteries and a battery charger.
The Seagate Portable Drive is a USB external hard drive features 1TB storage space and works with Windows or Mac computers.
Microphone base stand for the SM57 microphone included in the TASCAM kit.
LG Electronics USB 2.0 Ultra Slim Portable DVD+/-RW External Drive with M-DISC Support. Includes a USB cord to connect to devices for playback or writing.

The Logitech Wireless Presenter R400 allows you to advance or go back through your slides at the touch of a control key while moving around the room and engage your audience with reliable wireless range of up to 50 feet.
The Logitech USB Headset H390 with Noise Cancelling Microphone features padded headband and ear pads, rotating, noise canceling microphone, inline volume and mute controls with USB connections.

The lightweight Amazon Basics tripod can support most cameras up to 6.6 pounds. The tripod’s lockable legs can extend from 20 to 48 inches and include a center post that can be cranked up for a total height of 60 inches.
